text: #369 An agile equipe preparing an information‑system projeto creates a checklist for user‑centric requisito(s) needed to begin work. Which checklist does the equipe produce?
#370 A company PMO asks whether operations teams can use projeto management. Which three characteristics define a projeto? (Choose three.)
options: It can have positive and negative outcome.
It delivers a defined goal under a contrato.

text: #371 A small game studio needs three versions of a game, each in five one‑month iterations, to achieve early ROI. Which methodology should the projeto gerente adopt?
options: Scrum using sprints and retrospectives to maximize delivery and valor
Feature‑driven development (FDD) with marco(s) controlled by the dev gerente
Extreme Programming (XP) with paired development for faster delivery
Kanban for equipe flexibility within the given time frame

text: #372 A projeto gerente wants to evaluate solution results in a wider context to ensure acceptable behavior in production. Which evaluation technique should be used?
#373 Which option is an external enterprise environmental factor (EEF)?
options: Feedback received on a new product

text: #374 While onboarding recurso(s), which part of the projeto management plano will the projeto gerente update?
options: recurso(s) management plano and linha de base de custos
recurso(s) management plano and lessons‑learned register
recurso(s) management plano and aquisições management plano

text: #375 A monthly status report must compare performance to the baseline cronograma. How is cronograma variance (SV) on the caminho crítico calculated?
#376 After final entregável(is) are approved on cronograma, the client requests an additional feature. What documentation should the Product Owner already have?
#377 With a finalized linha de base do cronograma, how can the caminho crítico be identified?
options: Find the path with leveled recurso(s) and the shortest duration.
Identify tasks with folga that do not affect projeto duration.
Use the crashed cronograma to find the absolute shortest duration.
Identify the longest atividade path with the shortest possible duration.

text: #378 An adaptive projeto gerente must staff a top‑priority website migration by reallocating equipe members from other projects. How should the gerente assign these members?
#379 After a sprint review, users like the demonstrated functionality, but another sprint item is not ready for production. What should the projeto equipe do?
options: Demo the incomplete feature at the sprint retrospectiva.
Deploy only the functionality presented to the users.
Continue sprinting until the backlog is empty.
Wait until all in‑development stories are complete.

text: #380 When assembling a business case, which two elements are required? (Choose two.)

#381 A projeto equipe for a marketing company is acquiring leaflets and materials from competitors. The equipe is working on a projeto to release new products, and they are trying to get ideas on how to most efficiently market these new products.
#382 What are the requisito(s) that describe the behaviors of a product called?
#383 Which of the following is a goal of the projeto charter?
options: Detail requisito(s) for the projeto tasks.
List all tasks the equipe should perform in the projeto.
Empower the projeto gerente to manage the projeto.
Develop a business case to support the projeto.

text: #384 An adaptive equipe is working on a mobile banking application. The equipe conducted their sprint demo, which included twelve stories that were completed. This was the last sprint before the product was to be launched in the beta phase. One attendee noticed that a requested enhancement to share on social media was still in the Product Backlog. Why was the product still determined to be ready for delivery?
options: The development equipe completed all of the stories identified by the Product Owner as having the highest customer valor.
The development equipe ran out of time and did not pull the social‑media story from the backlog.
The sprint demo went smoothly and the equipe did not find any open issues.
The social‑media story is a marketing priority and less important than other priorities.

text: #385 An executive sponsor wants to be briefed on how the product will change over time. Which document should the business analyst use to prepare their presentation?
#386 When executing a projeto, a newly hired subject‑matter expert (SME) remarks that the cronograma could be crashed and was not assessed properly. What should the projeto gerente do next?
options: Update the linha de base do cronograma.
Review the linha de base do cronograma.

text: #387 A projeto equipe member is discussing a new projeto with their gerente. The projeto is very similar to a projeto delivered last year and the escopo is very well documented. Which of the following projeto‑delivery approaches should be recommended?

#388 A projeto is composed of three phases that are implemented in parallel without affecting one another. The baselines for each phase have been approved, and there is minimal ability to vary the baselines during execution. Which methodology did the projeto gerente adopt?
#389 During projeto execution, a key recurso(s) leaves the equipe for another job. What should the projeto gerente do in this situation?
options: Submit a solicitação de mudança for additional budget to secure a projeto recurso(s).
Distribute work to other equipe members to reduce impact to the projeto cronograma.
Consult with the functional gerente for a replacement recurso(s).
Consult the registro de riscos for an appropriate resposta ao risco.

text: #390 A construction projeto is underway and there are three months left to complete the building. A public authority responsible for approving the final stage is stalling the projeto. What should the projeto gerente do?
options: Visit the public authority headquarters and formally petition them for an explanation.
Mitigate the risco by requesting an alternative authority to participate in the approval processo(s).
Report the issue to major stakeholders and explore corrective actions with legal assistance.
Discuss this with the department head and arrive at a solution to expedite the approval.

text: #391 An adaptive projeto equipe is meeting for the first time and deciding on the projeto‑management approach. After defining the projeto artifacts, one equipe member argues that the events are missing. Which two elements should be included?
#392 How can emotional intelligence (EI) be effective in projeto management?
options: By preparing a projeto plano and managing equipe members
By reducing tension and increasing cooperation among equipe members

text: #393 A projeto risks delivering late because poor qualidade prevents user‑acceptance testing (UAT) from finishing. The Product Owner will not sign off until all Severity‑1 defects are fixed. What should the projeto gerente do?
options: Review the organizational chart to find someone else who can sign off UAT.
Ask developers to work longer hours to resolve the defects.
Create a risco in the registro de riscos for each S1 defect and assign actions.
Consult the registro de riscos and implement the risco‑response actions.

text: #394 Why is a projeto undertaken?
options: To create a unique product, service, or result
To achieve better management of recurso(s)
To increase understanding of projeto management
To teach program and portfolio management

text: #395 A projeto equipe is working on a driverless vehicle and is organizing a workshop with experts to analyze prototype data. Who should the projeto gerente invite to provide expert advice?
options: Major stakeholders nominated by the sponsor
Usual review participants with recognized certifications
Senior experts with high status in the academic community
Subject‑matter experts identified in the registro das partes interessadas

text: #396 During a kickoff meeting, the projeto sponsor presents an ambitious projeto, but stakeholders are not excited because the work seems inefficient. What could be missing from the business case?
#398 During projeto planning, which three of the following stakeholders are required to take part in the risco‑assessment meeting?

#399 equipe members lack market information to make decisions because no one understands the Asian market. They suggest recruiting members familiar with that market. What type of agile equipe would they be composing?
#400 A business gerente wants to start a projeto to launch a new product. How should the gerente initiate the projeto?
options: Ask a small equipe to produce a prototype before full‑scale development.
Assign a projeto gerente and ask them to document the projeto escopo.
Prepare a detailed business case to document projeto objetivo(s) and success criteria.
Discuss requisito(s) with the equipe for alternative products in the market.

text: #401 A business analyst is working on a projeto that follows an adaptive life cycle. Due to budgetary restrição(ões), the sponsor asks the equipe to focus on critical requisito(s). What should the business analyst do?

#402 A practitioner organized a requisito(s) workshop with the client’s frontline application users. The users explained that one of the challenges of the current application is that they must click on each input before entering data, which happens thousands of times a day. What competencies should the practitioner use to explain this need to the technicians?
#403 What tool can be used to track how involved and interested stakeholders are in a projeto?

#404 A production support system is being managed by a equipe. The equipe members cannot plano their work in advance, even for a week, because they do not know when new support issues will be submitted. The equipe cannot start working on new issues until they finish existing issues, no matter how long it takes. Which method should be used in this situation?
#405 A projeto’s business analyst has to understand the newly acquired technology and the impact it will have on the organization. Which tool should be used to understand the new technology?

#406 An adaptive equipe’s velocity dropped significantly in the last sprint due to the planned vacation of two equipe members. The sponsor wants to know how many more sprints it will take to complete the remaining projeto. How should the projeto gerente calculate future velocity?
options: Use the velocity of the last sprint.

text: #407 A new business analyst has joined mid‑projeto and updated the matriz de rastreabilidade dos requisitos. What should the business analyst do next?
options: Share it the same way as before.
Consult the business analysis comunicação(ões) management plano.
Ask the projeto gerente to share it at the next meeting.

text: #408 A projeto gerente is assigned to a projeto, but is unsure how to apply organizational recurso(s) before formal authorization. Which document should be used?
#409 Which of the following can a projeto gerente conduct if they have a parte interessada who is unresponsive and/or unsupportive?

#410 A projeto gerente has agreed on the requisito(s) and now needs to define the workflow for the end user. A critical step must be completed and validated by the end user before proceeding. Which modeling tool best describes this processo(s)?
#411 During a virtual kick‑off session, the sponsor highlights the significance of the projeto to the company. What message should be conveyed to the equipe in this meeting?
options: Assignment of key roles and responsibilities

text: #412 Who should stakeholders consult to discuss concerns about the current pacote de trabalho?
#413 A equipe tasked with designing a product to solve an unfamiliar problem is struggling to gain traction. What should the projeto gerente do next?
options: Add the issue to the registro de problemas.
Add the risco to the registro de riscos.
Meet with the sponsor for guidance.

text: #414 A projeto cronograma shows 14 units of work completed against a plano of 23 units. What is the cronograma variance (SV)?
#415 An organization has a equipe of specialists dedicated to solving a complex problem. What projeto management approach should they consider?
#416 When presenting a product roadmap to an adaptive equipe, which form of comunicação(ões) is most appropriate?
#417 What is the purpose of an adaptive stand‑up meeting?
options: Ask what work is done, calculate velocity, and decide next work.
Update the burndown chart, calculate velocity, and report impediments.
Ask what work is done, what will be done, and report impediments.
Review completed work, remove impediments, and calculate velocity.

text: #418 After the first iteração, the testing gerente approves the test report. The business‑unit gerente requests additional functionality before rollout approval. What should the projeto gerente do next?
options: Reschedule rollout to include new requisito(s).
Reschedule rollout to start with another business unit.

text: #419 What is the main purpose of a product roadmap?
options: Provide a view of new features and their delivery sequence.
Clarify the business valor of each feature.
Limit escopo and reduce future changes.

text: #420 In the business analysis aspect of a construction projeto, what is the purpose of the requisito(s) validation processo(s)?
options: Ensures successful delivery of business valor.
Ensures that the business problem is solved.
Ensures an accurate reflection of stakeholders’ intentions.

text: #421 Calculate the cronograma performance index (IDP) based on the following information: earned valor (VA) is 30 and planned valor (VP) is 15.
#422 Why is working in iterations usually more time-consuming than using a predictive life cycle?
options: Iterations are longer than the execution phase of a traditional projeto.
Timeboxing increases the time needed to accomplish tasks.
Having a minimum viable product first can take more time.
It takes time to understand what the projeto needs to deliver.

text: #423 During the execution of a predictive projeto, the need for a new product feature has been proposed by the customer. What should the projeto gerente do next?
options: Accept the customer's request and continue with elicitation of the new product features.
Decline any request by the customer and continue the projeto as initially planned.
Investigate the possibility of using the management reserve to pay for the extra hours the equipe will need to work.
Investigate the effect that such an integração will have on the projeto plano and propose a solicitação de mudança.

text: #424 A company is moving from a predictive to an adaptive approach. How should the company now translate the already planned estrutura analítica do projeto (EAP) (WBS) to adaptive iterations?
options: Accept this limitation and perform accordingly since the WBS can only be used in Scrum iterations.
Consider reforming the structure of the company first as it is difficult for a company to transition from predictive to adaptive methods.
Save the WBS in the historical data as the information can only be used for educational purposes and not as inputs for creating user stories.
Create a Product Backlog with the information depicted in the WBS and prioritize the newly developed user stories into iterations.

text: #425 A projeto equipe is reviewing projeto performance. During the execution phase, the projeto equipe discovers that there is an off-the-shelf (OTS) product which could reduce the timeline for development. What should they do?
options: Add the discovery to the premissa(s).
Evaluate the risco with the projeto equipe.
Conduct an opportunity analysis with the equipe.

text: #426 Two recurso(s) are performing a peer review of an artifact. What should be the outcome of the peer review?
options: The resulting documentation adheres to established organizational standards.
All business rules and data requisito(s) for each processo(s) are documented.
The data requisito(s) for each processo(s) are documented.
All relevant business rules for each processo(s) are documented.

text: #427 Which three of the following should a projeto gerente consider when customizing a projeto comunicação(ões) management plano? (Choose three.)
#428 What is one reason why stakeholders must be identified when performing business analysis?
options: To allow the business analyst to determine the projeto budget
To identify who should define the business requisito(s) for the projeto
To identify projeto timelines through business reviews
To determine a custo-benefit analysis for the projeto

text: #429 Who is responsible for the business case development document?
#430 A projeto gerente oversees a projeto in an adaptive environment. After each iteração, which type of meeting should the projeto gerente conduct?
#431 A projeto is at the closing stage. The projeto gerente asks the equipe to perform closing functions at the next meeting. Which atividade should be completed?
#432 In adaptive projects, who should approve the prioritization of the backlog?
#433 What should be done when the work-in-progress (WIP) limit is reached and new work has been requested?
options: Decompose the work and add it to the backlog.
Put the request in a holding area.
Ask for the priority level of the new request.
Add the work to the backlog.

text: #434 What are the three components of a estrutura analítica do projeto (EAP) (WBS) dictionary? (Choose three.)

#435 A business analyst is evaluating solutions against the expected results and logging defects along the way. The next task is to analyze the discrepancies prior to facilitating a go/no-go decision. Which technique should be used as a starting point to uncover problem areas?
#436 A business analyst is looking to uncover the root cause of a specific problem. What technique should the business analyst apply first?
#437 Which is the most accurate description of a backlog in agile?
options: The backlog is the sum of all the story point sizes for the features actually completed in each projeto iteração.
The backlog is the ordered list of all the work and helps the teams see how to deliver the highest valor without creating waste.
The backlog is the ordered list of all the completed work and helps the teams see how to deliver valor without creating waste.
The backlog is the ordered list of all the work, shows the work completed, and shows the effect of equipe members multitasking.

text: #438 What is the processo(s) of determining the stakeholders impacted by a business problem or opportunity?

#439 A projeto gerente joined a company to replace someone that left the projeto. There was no hand-over, but the previous projeto gerente developed a detailed cronograma and the projeto equipe completed some projeto entregável(is). The equipe is not colocated and some equipe members were recently hired full time. What is the most suitable projeto-delivery method?

#440 An organization's annual report indicates that there needs to be a new strategy that prioritizes long-term goals and repetitive solutions. What projeto methodology should this organization consider?
#441 A projeto equipe member is reviewing the escopo of a task with an end user and realizes that requisito(s) have changed. Which projeto artifact should be used in this situation?
#442 How should the Product Owner prioritize a list of tasks to be accomplished?
options: Tasks that create business valor should be done first.
Tasks that can be completed quickly should be done first.
Tasks that reduce the Product Backlog should be done first.
Tasks that enhance the functionality of a product should be done first.

text: #443 Vicus (equipe member) says they lack enough market information to make decisions; Verna (agile facilitator) confirms this is because no one on the equipe understands the Asian market. On which document should this situation be registered?
#444 A new projeto gerente has been assigned to an ongoing projeto. What will the projeto gerente use to identify the responsibilities of the stakeholders in the projeto?
options: Responsible, accountable, consult, and inform (RACI) chart

text: #445 A backwards‑path calculation estimates that the last pacote de trabalho will be completed 24 days from this coming Monday. The Scrum equipe operates in two‑week sprints. How many sprints are needed to complete the work?

#446 A projeto gerente is in the planning stage and wants to show progress to the sponsor by tracking significant events in the projeto life cycle that signal key achievements. Which event is being planned?

#447 A computer application development projeto is nearing closure. The projeto gerente uses a checklist that requires formal feature‑to‑feature approval to demonstrate compliance with the customer’s specifications. Which document is the projeto gerente using?
